title: 关于1.9服务器mypey宠物插件的问题
author: yinse
txt_content:
我在我的spigot1.9服务器里装了MyPet最新版2.0.5
可是只有op才能抓宠物，已经给了
    - MyPet.user.keep.*
    - MyPet.user.leash.*

这玩家组，还是不可以，记得以前开1.72服务器时候就这样就可以的啊
难道因为最新版本改了用法？
求指教 ！赏金100.

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
keep早在1.0.7版就移除了，而且你看这条
changed most permissions: readWikiarticle for the new permissions 
大部分权限都已经修改过，请你阅读官方wiki介绍
捕捉宠物的话你给这个就好
- MyPet.leash.*

replies.author: yinse
replies.txt_content:
Version 2.0.0

+MyPet now supports Minecraft: 1.7.10/1.8.3/1.8.9/1.9
+MyPet has a proper API now
+added update notification on server start
+added new permissions for every pettype to the pettrade command
MyPet.command.trade.recieve.type.<pettype>
MyPet.command.trade.offer.type.<pettype>
+added new permissions for viewing petinfo of pets from other players (/petinfo <playername>)
MyPet.command.info.other
+support for&colors:&1 &2etc.
ochanged most permissions: readWikiarticle for the new permissions
oMySQL max connection amount can now changed in the config (default:CORES * 2)
oriding your pet now decreases the hunger value
-fixed some bugs
这个是更新日志，看不懂呀，

replies.author: MuaMua
replies.txt_content:
我去2.0.5了啊，我竟然还在用2.0.4. 只要加MyPet.*就可以，放心虽然乍一看带个*号像给了全部权限....其实不是，只是给了普通玩家该有的全部权限，可以自己打开.jar包里查看plugin.yml.就知道我没乱说了。

不放心给自己小号MyPet.*去服了测试，只有普通玩家的权限。毕竟我在用2.0.4，不会错
